page.title: 02CHURCHES IN & AROUND MILLAND
page.content: the northern part of the area is servedby st. luke's church which stands on the high ground off the A3 road. there is an ancient chapel in the churchyard which has long been closed. the old rectory is now a private house and a smaller rectory was built a few years ago in rake. a smaller church at rake is looked after by the same vicar. milland valley is server by st. luke's church in linch the victorian church at iping marsh having ben closed a few years ago, although its churchyard is still open for burials. the linch rectory is in the centre of the valley near the crossroads. milland also has an evangelical chapel with a manse adjoining it. at the north eastern corner of the block stands the beautiful church of linchmere.
